sources.title: Silver Blaze (1937)
sources.description: Holmes takes a vacation and visits his old friend Sir Henry Baskerville. His vacation ends when he suddenly finds himself in the middle of a double-murder mystery. Now he's got to find Professor Moriarty and the horse Silver Blaze before the great cup final horse race. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/silver-blaze-1937/
